ygData.msgSnippet: Tucson lies on the bed, and waits for Stanton to hook him up to connect him to Rodimus. I promised to save him Stanton, I will not go back on my word.  I know

Tucson lies on the bed, and waits for Stanton to hook him up to connect him=
 to Rodimus. 

"I promised to save him Stanton, I will not go back on my wo=
rd.  I know I will be able to do this, and if any harm comes to me, then no=
thing will be held against any of you but myself.  I will take full blame f=
or what happens.  In Primus's speed my friends, in Primus's speed.  Good wi=
ll prevail, and the light will remain forever lit.  Now, let's do this befo=
re we lose him."

He lies still to await hookup.

Outside in the observatio=
n room, it doesn't take Straight Shot long to see what is going on.  But de=
ep down she knew he was doing the right thing, she felt it too.  Night Shif=
t could also feel what his comrade was up to, and a feeling of absolute pos=
itivity comes over him as well.  Quickstride, however has the same feelings=
 as Noctorro and Bump.  But Rat Trap holds onto the positivity that Straigh=
t Shot and Night Shift share as well as Silverbolt.

" I know wheels, he's =
gonna make it, I know he is.  Somethn' inside me tells me so and that doesn=
't happen too often."

Straight Shot looks to him, and holds his hand.

"Yo=
u feel it too, so do I.  He can do this, I know he can.  Silverbolt's right=
, he can do this. We have to believe he can. It's our belief in him that's =
gonna make him pull through."

Night Shift keeps a finger crossed as he sta=
nds next to Silverbolt.

"You feel it too, huh Silverbolt.  That deep down =
feeling that no matter what happens, good is gonna prevail.  It's real guys=
, it's real.  Tucson Prime's got somethn' inside him that I can't explain b=
ut it's there and it's gonna work."

Rat Trap chimes in.

" Just think, we'=
ll have two Primes plus Lord Elder, and Lord Perseus on our side.  That's r=
eally gonna put a damper on lizard lip's day.  Ohh yeah, when we're all bac=
k tagether, look out, because that golden age is just a few shots away."

S=
traight Shot listens to him.

" And then maybe, just maybe we'll have somet=
hing to celebrate."

As Tuscon entered the room Santon stepped out and guided him over
> towards=
 the bed. At the same time Legacy slid over another operating
> bed so that=
 it lay next to Rodimus.
>

another small portion of
> Rodimus' frame and he quickly attached power all=
ocation cables to the
> spot.
> 
> Santon nodded, satisfied at Bump's progr=
ess and then turned back to
> Tuscon, "Rodimus' life signs are beginning to=
 fail. We will need you
> to continue giving your unique spark energy to hi=
m. This would give us
> more time to complete this."
> 
> Bump looked up fr=
om his position over Rodimus, "The problem is we
> don't know exactly what'=
s draining him, and we don't know what risk
> there is to you."
> 
> Santon=
 looked back at Tuscon, "He's right. If you don't want to do
> this, we wil=
l understand. But if you do, then lie back and I will
> connect you."
